body: To be honest I'm bias AF when in a hentai the MC do a 180. I somehow don’t enjoy these stories of a "Goody Two-Shoes" tries be some kind of hot shot in the act of sex… IMO if the dude is a dork keep him as a dork it loses credibility when he suddenly starts acting like a big shot when in reality he is a duffus… as well as if the dude is a douche let him be a douchebag don’t turn it around at the end... (me trying to get realism in hentai… Nuff said Lol!)…
